arts.ttl: Manchester City trained earlier today ahead of clash with Everton.
arts.sum: In bad news for Pep Guardiola’s side, Abdukodir Khusanov and Rodri failed to train with their teammates today. Ben Ransom of Sky Sports News has reported via X that Omar Marmoush and Rayan Ait-Nouri have trained with the Manchester City squad today.

arts.ttl: “Grealish factor is a massive blow” for Everton as Man City handed “minor miracle” boost
arts.sum: The absence of Everton’s “main man” Jack Grealish is a “massive blow” for the Toffees ahead of Saturday’s Premier League clash with Manchester City at the Etihad Stadium, Citizens expert Steven McInerney tells Sports Mole.

arts.ttl: Ranked – Top 3 Everton Goals V Manchester City
arts.sum: The Toffees travel to the Etihad this weekend for a Premier League game against Manchester City. Ahead of the trip down the East Lancs, we look at three great Everton goals against the Citizens. 3 – Demarai Gray, Manchester City 1-1 Everton. December 2022 Everton travelled to Manchester with just one win in eight as we starred down the barrel of a relegation scrap. An Erling Haaland strike on 24 minutes could’ve opened the floodgates. arts.sum: Will Pep Guardiola’s side make it three consecutive Premier League wins? We look ahead to Saturday’s clash with our Manchester City vs Everton prediction and preview. arts.ttl: Manchester City vs Everton predictions: Fresh Foden can punish visitors
arts.sum: Manchester City host Everton in the Premier League on Saturday and James Milton expects one of England's forgotten forwards to catch the eye for the Citizens.
